title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, August 31, 2021
description: Manga artist Yumiko Oshima was born on this day, 1947. A member of the Year 24 Flower Group, who revolutionized “shojo manga,” comics for girls.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Manga artist Yumiko Oshima was born on this day, 1947. A member of the Year 24 Flower Group, who revolutionized “shojo manga,” comics for girls.
